Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I never thought I'd end up at an event like this. Thanks for inviting me, Commandant... uh...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You struggle to signal Echo from within the shopping bags that you are okay, but she looks troubled and quickly steps in to help carry two of them.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Even though she's got her hands full, her armor decked out like a Christmas tree."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I'm sorry, Commandant. I should've been more controlled...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No worries.', 3: '18', 4: 'This shopping street is seriously tempting, though.', 5: '18'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "But... I've pretty much blown through all the coins we busted our butts to earn together, Commandant...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spending money seems to be the "rule" of this place.'}
{3: 'You motion for Echo to check out the sign at the entrance of the commercial street, which clearly lays out several "Guidelines".'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: 'But still... what I did back there was kind of rude. Sorry about that.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo struggles a bit, nearly dropping the shopping bags, as she performs a fancy apology gesture.'}
{2: '...', 3: '29', 4: "Let's put these bags down over there for now.", 5: '29'}
{3: 'There is a nearby square where we can take a load off.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory252.png'}
{3: 'After you drop the bags, Echo settles down gracefully, checking out the whole scene of the commercial street.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: "Valentine's Day... I never knew about these festivals before. This is way cooler than I expected.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But wait, there's more.", 3: '36', 4: "(You quickly fill Echo in on the story and poems behind these lovers' days in the Golden Age.)", 5: '36'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Ah, now it all makes sense... No wonder the coins have those magpie designs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Beneath faint moon, vast sky tranquil, Milky Way aligns, eternal... Those Kowloong verses are something else. I gotta jot them down before I forget.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Love, enduring time's vast stages, dawn to dusk, mere fleeting pages...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "The poetry of Kowloong... it's just captivating, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She recites the verses with grace, from the majestic to the simple. It takes a while before Echo finally stops writing.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Ah! Sorry about that... l lost track of time and kept you waiting, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No worries.', 3: '47', 4: "Well, then you'll just have to make it up to me.", 5: '47'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Hmm... maybe this will make up for it, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She digs into the shopping bag at her feet. With a flourish, she presents a beautifully wrapped box containing a pen adorned with a galaxy pattern.'}

{2: 'Echo', 3: 'I spotted this in a shop over there and thought it was just perfect for you, Commandant. And I paired it with this notebook, featuring a row of magpies, just like the "Bridge of Magpies" you mentioned.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "And these pendants shaped like birds and clouds. They'd look great hanging on your personal terminal or in your room. And...", 4: '1'}
{3: "The pile of gifts meant for you keeps growing as Echo's shopping bags empty out."}
{2: 'Wait, all these for me? Seriously?', 3: '55', 4: "There's so much!", 5: '55'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Yep, every bit of it. These are all things I thought would be perfect for you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'And these... are for my sister.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After distributing the gifts, only one bag remains on the ground.'}
{2: 'Wait, did you only get this one for yourself?', 3: '59'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Yes, I didn't really see anything else I needed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I never imagined I'd be doing something like this before. This place is really something...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo relaxes her usually stiff posture.'}
{2: "Now it's my turn to give you a gift.", 3: '66', 4: "(Pull out a book that's been tucked away in your pocket for a while)", 5: '66'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'This is... a collection of Kowloong poetry! Amazing!', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm glad you like it.", 3: '69', 4: "Getting this wasn't a walk in the park.", 5: '69'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant! I really like it!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Silently, Echo's armor sidles up from the side, leaving behind a gift for her."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg'}
{3: "With the sun sinking low, the fading light marks the end of today's adventures."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory252.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory252.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: 'If only today lasts forever...', 4: '1'}
{2: "So, what's the plan for tomorrow?", 3: '85'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "My calendar says we're hitting up another conservation area...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "It means I'll be away from you for a bit again, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'But hey, no biggie.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'After all... Dawn to dusk, mere fleeting pages, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the fading light, she flashes a gentle smile.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "W-what's with that grin? Don't tell me... this poem isn't saying what I think it is?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Oh, come on... quit laughing!...', 4: '1'}
